dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4548 IH: Re-Integration of Ex-Offenders Through Technology Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cohen (for himself, Mr. Rangel, and Ms. Norton) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To direct the Secretary of Labor to include programs that teach technology literacy in any job training program for ex-offenders offered under the Workforce Investment Act of 1998.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Re-Integration of Ex-Offenders Through Technology Act.

section.header: Inclusion of technology literacy in ex-offender job training programs
section.text: The Secretary of Labor shall include programs that teach technology literacy in any job training program for ex-offenders offered under the Workforce Investment Act of 1998 (29 U.S.C. 2801 et seq.).
